articles.content: INDIANAPOLIS (WRTV) - An Indianapolis couple married for 33 years planned to get the COVID-19 vaccine as soon as possible in 2021, but the two didnt make it that far, contracting the virus and dying … [+1842 chars]

articles.author: Neil Genzlinger
articles.title: Sylvain Sylvain of the Proto-Punk New York Dolls Dies at 69 - The New York Times
articles.description: He was a core member of a group that had limited commercial success in the early 1970s and didn’t last long but proved hugely influential.
articles.content: The band made a quick splash but within a few years had dissolved, leaving only two albums from its heyday, New York Dolls (1973) and the prophetically titled Too Much Too Soon (1974, the title borro… [+1516 chars]

articles.author: Lauren M. Johnson, CNN
articles.title: Actor Dave Bautista offers $20,000 in case of manatee scraped with word 'TRUMP' - CNN
articles.description: There is already a reward for information leading to the person or people responsible for writing "TRUMP" on a manatee in Florida, but actor Dave Bautista is taking it a step further.
